entry.title: Document
entry.content:
Document Version

Date Doc Version Description PIC
2020/12/21 1.0.0 Wu

API

Overview of AFT API:

Method Endpoint Usage
POST /bill/create create a new virtual Account.
POST /bill/query inquiry an existing va.
POST /bill/status inquiry va status.
POST /payment/payment do payment
POST /payment/details inquiry transfer status.
POST
POST
POST
POST

URL

URL that you can access:

URL Usage
https://dev.afinpay.co.id Development
https://api.afinpay.co.id Production

entry.title: Response Code
entry.content:
Response Code Desc
0 Success 成功
1000
2000 link down 系统错误
2010 Invalid Parameter 入参错误，详情
2001 sign fail 签名校验失败
2002
2003 Bank/Channel Not Found 系统不支持该银行
3000 Merchant setting not config 商户配置
3001 Merchant has no Access 商户配置
3002 Merchant channel rate is not found for UID 商户配置
3003
3010 Phone not found
3100 Bank does not operate or bank host uncreachable 银行未响应
3101 Switching does not operate or Switching host uncreachable
3200 Insufficient fund 余额不足
3204 Exceed Withdrawal/Deposit Amount Limit 提现受限
3210 Exceed Transaction Amount limit 超出交易额度
3212 Amount Transaction is Under RTGS limit Amount 不够RTGS
3220 duplicate transmission 重复提交
3221 already paid 已支付
3300 Suspected Fraud 可疑
3310
4000 restricted card 受限信用卡
5000 incorrect OTP
5001 expired OTP
5002 transaction need OTP
401 Unauthorized

entry.title: Signature
entry.content:
Simple

Digital signature ensures reliability and anti-repudiation of data transmitted. Signature is generated by the service requestor, and verified by the service recipient.

The payload data will be signed with SHA256-HMAC algorithm using your Consumer Secret. The signature is formed by the specified payload. The signature value is then encoded with Base64 and filled into API requests header AFT-Signature.

Payload

Payload consists of path, verb, token, timestamp, and body. Example payload:

Details of each element inside the payload are explained below:

1. Path

The value for path is the URL after hostname and port without the query parameters.

Example:

from

to

2. Verb

HTTP method in uppercase, i.e. GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, and DELETE.

3. Token

Token used in Authorization header.

Example:

4. Timestamp

Timestamp at the moment you call the API. The timestamp format must follow ISO8601 format (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSZ). It has to be in the zero UTC offset.

Example:

5. Body

Request body sent for the API call. Example:

If there is no request body, such as on GET call, leave it empty. Example:

entry.title: Token
entry.content:
This endpoint is used to generate token. This token is required for making an API call. Put this token in Authorization header.

Sample

HTTP Request

Request Header

Key Value Mandatory
Content-Type application/x-www-form-urlencoded Yes

Request Body

Field Data Type Mandatory Value
grant_type string Yes client_credentials

entry.title: Create VA
entry.content:
This endpoint is used to create new virtual account.

HTTP Request

Request Header

Key Value Mandatory
Content-Type application/json Yes

Request Body

Field Data Type Max Char Mandatory Description
appId String Yes Merchant ID
nonceStr String Yes
timestamp String Yes
sign String Yes
amount String Yes
type String Yes
billingType String Yes
outOrderNo String Yes
customerName String Yes
customerEmail String No
customerPhone String No
datetimeExpired String No
version String No API Version
bankCode String Yes

Request Sample

Response Body

Field Data Type Max Char Mandatory Description
appId String Yes Merchant ID
version String Yes API Version
nonceStr String Yes
timestamp String Yes
sign String Yes
resCode String Yes
resMsg String
resultCode String
errorCode String
errorMsg String
orderNo String
virtualAccount String
amount String

Response Sample

Error Sample

Create VA >>

Inquiry VA >>

Get VA Status >>

entry.title: Inquiry VA
entry.content:
This endpoint is used to get virtual account information that has been created.

resultCode String
